column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////About 40 of our friends and family were in attendance
column2: and Ba-Ba-Reeba fit us all into one of their dining rooms. Ashly was a fanstastic help in planning everything with us
column3: from the menu to the room lay-out. The food was wonderfu
column4: featuring of course various paellas for the entrees. Appetizers were terrific as well
column5: gallons of tasty sangria were consumed by one and all.
